Class pHCalculator

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.chemistry.acidbase.pHCalculator
public class pHCalculator extends Object
pH and buffer calculations.

Supports both raw double and Quantity-based APIs for flexibility.

* @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static double
    bufferCapacity(double totalBufferConcentration, double Ka, double pH)
    Calculates buffer capacity (approximate). β = 2.303 * C * Ka * [H+] / (Ka + [H+])^2
    static double
    bufferPH(double pKa, double conjugateBaseMolarity, double acidMolarity)
    Henderson-Hasselbalch equation for buffer pH. pH = pKa + log10([A-]/[HA])
    static Real
    bufferPH(Real pKa, Real conjugateBaseMolarity, Real acidMolarity)
    Henderson-Hasselbalch equation using Real.
    static double
    concentrationFromPH(double pH)
    Calculates hydrogen ion concentration from pH.
    static Real
    concentrationFromPH(Real pH)
    Calculates hydrogen ion concentration from pH using Real.
    static boolean
    isAcidic(double pH)
    Checks if a solution is acidic (pH invalid input: '<' 7).
    static boolean
    isBasic(double pH)
    Checks if a solution is basic/alkaline (pH > 7).
    static boolean
    isNeutral(double pH, double tolerance)
    Checks if a solution is neutral (pH ≈ 7).
    static double
    KaFromPKa(double pKa)
    Calculates Ka from pKa.
    static double
    pHFromConcentration(double hydrogenIonMolarity)
    Calculates pH from hydrogen ion concentration. pH = -log10[H+]
    static Real
    pHFromConcentration(Real hydrogenIonMolarity)
    Calculates pH from hydrogen ion concentration using Real.
    static double
    pKaFromKa(double Ka)
    Calculates the pKa from Ka.
    static double
    pOHFromPH(double pH)
    Calculates pOH from pH. pOH = 14 - pH (at 25°C)

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • pHFromConcentration

      public static double pHFromConcentration(double hydrogenIonMolarity)
      Calculates pH from hydrogen ion concentration. pH = -log10[H+]

    • concentrationFromPH

      public static double concentrationFromPH(double pH)
      Calculates hydrogen ion concentration from pH. [H+] = 10^(-pH)

    • pOHFromPH

      public static double pOHFromPH(double pH)
      Calculates pOH from pH. pOH = 14 - pH (at 25°C)

    • bufferPH

      public static double bufferPH(double pKa, double conjugateBaseMolarity, double acidMolarity)
      Henderson-Hasselbalch equation for buffer pH. pH = pKa + log10([A-]/[HA])
